name: Mycelium (Flora Bee)
description:
A short game where you control fungus that transform waste into new life.

Mycelium was made for the Global Game Jam 2023 in 3 days with art predominantly made in MS Paint

Controls:

Move: WASD

Quit: Escape

Credits:

Flora Bee - Programming & Design

Lio Allen - Art & Writing

Marvin Chatting - Art & Animation

Ripley Allen - Art, Animation & Music
